name: Tang
declaringWar: You won't ever be able to bother me again. Go meet Yama.
attacked: Fool! I will disembowel you all!
defeated: You have proven to be a cunning and competent adversary. I congratulate you on your victory.
introduction: Greetings, I am Empress Wu Zetian. China desires peace and development. You leave us alone, we'll leave you alone.
tradeRequest: My friend, do you think you can accept this request?
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

name: Akkad
declaringWar: You hinder the interests of the Ruler of Totality, and thus, you shall be vanquished.
attacked: You will see a unprecendented conquest by me, little man. Our troops are never busy in peace.
defeated: Say all you want about my land, you can smash my epics about me, but I am engraved to the memory of the gods.
introduction: I am Sargon of Akkad, the King of Akkad herself, King of Sumer, and King of the Universe. What would you like to discuss to I?
tradeRequest: Our heartland may be far away from yours, but we offer you this agreement.

name: Sumer
declaringWar: Your actions will guarantee your imminent death, you will be immortal.... as a villain of the epics.
attacked: Dont you see, how I spent all these years searching for immortality? I am about to have it.
defeated: I may die a mortal death, but my deeds will be enscribed throughout the world once your filthy cities rot.
introduction: I am Gilgamesh, King of Uruk, would you like to be friends with me?
tradeRequest: Greetings! We offer you this trade exchange, we understand your reasoning if you may reject this.

name: Elam
declaringWar: A barbarian you are, your plains will be piled up by the bodies of your soldiers
attacked: Such foolish decision. I have destroyed dynasties, and you shall be one of them.
introduction: Welcome, foreigner. I am Kindattu of Elam.
tradeRequest: Foreigner, we can exchange goods if you will.

name: Mitanni
declaringWar: We may be different from the rest of our neighbours, but we can still destroy you.
attacked: Do you dare to challenge me?
introduction: Welcome, stranger. I am Parshatatar, king of the Hurrians.
tradeRequest: Stranger, we can exchange goods if you will.

name: Hittites
declaringWar: We will build hills out of your soldier's corpses.
attacked: Do you dare to challenge me, little one?
defeated: You can destroy our cities, pillage our farms, but our light shall prevail to the gods.
introduction: Welcome, stranger. I am Mursili, king of the Hittites.
hateHello: What do you want?, little one?
tradeRequest: Dearest king, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [+2 Gold, +1 Production] from [Iron] tiles [in all cities]

name: Luwia
declaringWar: You are a danger to us.
defeated: Sooner your cities and farms will be destroyed by the wrath of the gods.
introduction: Welcome to Luwia, I am the king Tarhuntaradu.
tradeRequest: Dearest king, we can exchange goods if you will.
uniques: [+1 Gold, +2 Culture] from [Gold Ore] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Gold, +3 Culture] from [Copper] tiles [in all cities]

name: Minoa
attacked: A lion is more civilized than what you are, do you want to go to Daedalus?
defeated: I wish you fortune for the ages to come.
introduction: I am Minos of Crete, bow down for you are mortals.
tradeRequest: Greetings mortal, we can have goods to exchange.

name: Assyria
declaringWar: I fear there is no other choice but to remove you from this world!
attacked: I think you will come to regret this decision...most unwise.
defeated: We may be defeated, but our legacy will live on in the written word!
introduction: I welcome you to the great kingdom of Assyria...have you come to view my library?

name: Israel
declaringWar: You are a threat to our salvation.
attacked: With Yahweh we shall smite your armies and follow His orders, unless He wills otherwhise.
defeated: Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I fear no evil, for He is with me.
introduction: Welcome to the land of the Israelites. I am David the anointed king, the leader of the people Moses had freed from slavery, and a servant of Yahweh.

name: Phoenicia
declaringWar: The warships will arive at any time now, be afraid.
attacked: Your foolish boats will sink before your harbor is out of your sight.
introduction: I am Hiram, king of Sur. Here you see are my grandiose ports.
uniques: Enables embarkation for land units <starting from the [Ancient era]>
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <after discovering [Compass]>

name: Lacedaemon
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Sparta is willing to serve you!

name: Palembang
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Now, witness the power of the Indonesians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?
